newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Swire Pacific buys 700,000 B shares.
newsitem.headline: Swire Pacific buys 700,000 B shares.

text.p: Swire Pacific Ltd said on Thursday it had bought 700,000 of its B shares at HK$10.60 and HK$10.65 per share on Wednesday.
The company has been disappointed by its share price performance and has been buying back shares this year. Swire B shares closed the morning session unchanged at HK$10.65.
"We bought a few shares yesterday, 700,000 B shares at two prices -- HK$10.60 and HK$10.65," group finance director Peter Johansen told Reuters in an interview.
"We don't have a particular policy of going for X percent but from time to time as opportunities arise we are prepared to go to the market."
Johansen said the aim was to add shareholder value.
"We are not interested in creating what will be a false floor for our share price," he said.
